title: Ticket #1128: allow user to specify mac address for vm universe job using vmware
description:
Prior to this fix, Xen and KVM allow the user to specify the mac address for the virtual machine's ethernet interface using the JobVM_MACADDR attribute in the submit file. However, this hasn't yet been supported on vmware. I've added the same using this fix.

LIMITATION: this is a cascade of the limitation that vmware places on mac addresses. Static mac addresses for vmware virtual machine may only be from the set

  1. 50:56:00:00:00 to 00:50:56:3F:FF:FF
check_ins: 2010-Jan-20 17:21   Check-in [16946]: Ticket number #1128 - This patch adds support in the vmuniverse for the user to specify the mac address being used by a vmware virtual machine. Fix Limitation: the mac address should be within the range 00:50:56:00:00:00 to 00:50:56:3F:FF:FF. This is a vmware requirement and hence I can't figure a way [...] (By Varghese Mathew )
